text: Ivo Trumbić (2 April 1935 – 12 March 2021) was a Croatian water polo player. Trumbić coached the Netherlands to a bronze medal at the 1976 Summer Olympics. He was one of the few sportspeople who won Olympic medals in water polo as a player and head coach.1976, Montreal: Ivo Trumbic and the bronze Dutch ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Water polo coaches Category:Yugoslavian water polo players Category:Olympic gold medalists for Yugoslavia Category:Olympic silver medalists for Yugoslavia
title: Ivo Trumbić
